channel.title: defjaf tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from defjaf.

item.description: I am honestly unsure whether the email “Welcome to the ua-internal-reseacrher [sic] Group” is legit. Do any of my @ImperialCollege colleagues know?
I am honestly unsure whether the email “Welcome to the ua-internal-reseacrher [sic] Group” is legit. Do any of my https://t.co/iUcU4fjkLc colleagues know?

@daringfireball In fact, NFC payments were pretty common in the UK and EU prior to Apple Pay… The claim that “NFC payments were used by almost no one” is US-centric and/or disingenuous, and specifically not relevant to the EU where this report originates.
@daringfireball (To be clear, the payments in the UK and EU are mostly from cards, not mobile phones, and I am pretty sure the 2017 90% number refers to phone-based transactions.)
@cosmonist @AlanHeavens 😜 Although you’re missing a lone P(E) factor on the RHS!…
